article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11Wazrj hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: When And Why Did We Stop Crucifying People

div.p: The slow death of an ancient torture method.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YOpJZ4 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: 12 Lonely Negative Words

div.p: Are you disgusted, disgruntled and disheveled? Well, unfortunately you’re never going to be gusted, gruntled or sheveled.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-14rDq7c hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: The Hail Mary Products Of Desperate Companies

div.p: It's the longshot, the one thing that could save the company. Sometimes it resonates so well with the masses that the company is saved from oblivion. Sometimes, even the best products can't stop the inevitable.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-X1JZJs hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: When Will Apple Get Serious About Security?

div.p: It's time for some real talk about how data is kept and accessed.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-14DFjth hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: He Put Secret Compartments In Cars, So The DEA Put Him In Prison

div.p: Alfred Anaya was a genius at installing secret compartments in cars. If they were used to smuggle drugs without his knowledge, he figured that wasn’t his problem. He was wrong.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YEKqN0 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Buzzkill? How Climate Change Could Eventually End Coffee

div.p: Researchers are desperately trying to keep up with new threats to the plant caused by global warming.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11XRrWc hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Des Moines Register Maps Which Public Schools Are Totally Unguarded

div.p: The Des Moines Register is in a bit of hot water after they published an interactive Google Map revealing the level of security in most Iowa's school districts.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XoZUCN hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: TRUST US, TURN UP THE VOLUME

h2.a: Old Man Demonstrates Nunchucks Skill In Parking Lot

div.p: "Good Friday is a time to get your kung fu, nunchuck panda on in you local Food Lion parking lot and prepare to whoop the devil on Easter Sunday."

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-X0Hqag hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Photos Of Old People Who See Their Younger Selves In The Mirror

div.p: These award-winning pictures poetically illustrate the receding memories of people who suffer from dementia, who often start losing their newer memories first and are left with older ones of their youth.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZHgWe6 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: How A Tool For Perfect Human Vision Grew From One Of NASA's Greatest Blunders

div.p: Technology used to build NASA’s newest eyes on the heavens will help people see farther and clearer.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10gktiI hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Taking A Bath In Hitler's Tub For Vogue

div.p: Just hours after Adolf Hitler committed suicide on April 30th, 1945, former fashion model and Vogue correspondent, Elizabeth (Lee) Miller was photographed taking a bath in his tub.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11V8HLE hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Diving Into The Dolphin Superpod, The Semi-Annual Orgy At Sea

div.p: They know how to party, dolphins do, and one of their hot spots lies in the Pacific Ocean, 50 miles off the coast of Costa Rica. Our intrepid correspondent got his hand stamped and made his way inside.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-173wqxa hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: THE HOLY GRAIL OF PIMP CUPS

h2.a: Watch This Silversmith Craft Pope Francis' Chalice

div.p: One of the perks of the papacy is all the sick swag you get: rings, robes, more hats than a Lids franchise and now your very own chalice.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11TlcY5 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Want To Solve The Crime Problem? Solve The Alcohol Problem

div.div: The real correlation between drugs and crime stems from alcohol. washingtonpost.com/blogs/w...

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YOCDX9 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Congressman: Drink Alone To Prevent Domestic Violence

div.p: In the same week he called migrant workers "wetbacks" in an interview, Rep. Don Young suggested that drinking alone was the best way to curb domestic violence.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YOq2Dm hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: On The Set Of A Sci-Fi Porno

div.p: I've done set visits before. But I've never done one quite like this one, shot (unsurprisingly) inside a nondescript building in the Valley, next door to apartment complexes whose residents likely have no idea that they live in gang-bang territory.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10mbuw9 hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: THIS IS WHY NOBODY TAKES YOU SERIOUSLY

h2.a: North Korean Photo Reveals 'U.S. Mainland Strike Plan'

div.p: In a photo published in the Korea Worker’s Party paper plans for a strike on the U.S. mainland are clearly –and therefore probably deliberately– visible.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-164GsdU hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Facebook’s Gay Marriage Map

div.p: How effective has the Human Rights Campaign been? Facebook has taken a stab at crunching some numbers, and come up the following conclusion.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-1066X1K hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: GET A BETTER NAME, BOSTON ZOMBIE PUNK

h2.a: Cops Ineptly Pretending To Be Punk Rockers On The Internet

div.p: The Boston police go undercover on the Internet to stop the city’s most dreaded scourge: DIY indie-rock shows.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XjMcBi hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Scientists Invent Bread That Won't Go Moldy

div.p: We waste a lot of food, which is bad for the economy and the environment. Now scientists have found a natural, bacteria-fueled way of keeping fungus away from our leftovers.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-106Qx9v hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: How A Doctor Discovered U.S. Walls Were Poisonous

div.p: Doctors have recognized that high doses of lead are downright poisonous since, at least, the days of Hippocrates. But it was not until 1979 that a pediatrician and child psychiatrist first documented the dangers of even the lowest forms of lead exposure.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Xo2rNR hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Spreading Racism Via Facebook

div.p: If you're a heavy Facebook user, you're more like to respond positively to racist remarks.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XgXffi hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Hotel Seeks 'Professional Sleeper'

div.p: This is not a joke.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-14qWRNu hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Weight Of The World

div.p: The average body mass index (BMI) values for adults around the globe compared.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11VF28Q hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: The History Of G.I. Joe

div.p: The evolution of the All-American Hero from artist's mannequin to action figure .

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YFZJCb hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Google's Self-Driving Robot Cars Are Ruining My Commute

div.p: Away from the general unease they stir up, the Google self-driving cars come with very real consequences.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YLGxzO hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Watch This Magnetic Putty Absorb A Block

div.p: Here's a time lapse of magnetic putty as it absorbs a rare-earth magnet.
